src:
Dette er de 100 rikeste i Trøndelag
05 Nov 2019, 06:57 by Ståle Langørgen
Odd Reitan topper igjen listen over de med høyest ligningsformue i Trøndelag.
Det viser skattelistene for 2018 som ble offentliggjort tirsdag morgen (se liste over de 100 rikeste i Trøndelag nederst i saken).
text:
These are the 100 richest in Trøndelag
05 Nov 2019, 06:57 by Ståle Langørgen
Odd Reitan tops the list of those with the highest tax assets in Trøndelag.
It shows the tax lists for 2018 that were published on Tuesday morning (see list of the 100 richest in Trøndelag at the bottom of the case).
